full_summary:
Cable Television (CATV) Services
==================================

**Notice ID**
------------

* Reference Number: cb-755-90811409
* Solicitation Number: 21120-23-4484965
* Amendment Number: 6
* Date of Publication: 2024-01-12

**Tender Information**
-------------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-01, 14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-05-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-04-30
* Tender Status: Expiré

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal

**Contract Information**
-----------------------

* Contracting Entity: Correctional Service Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 340 Laurier Ave West, Ottawa, ON K1P0P9

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide cable television (CATV) services to various office locations in the National Capital Region (NCR). The contractor must provide ongoing CATV services, including installation, maintenance, warranty, and support services, as well as all necessary hardware and software components, except for television sets. The contractor will also be responsible for providing bilingual (English and French) customer service.

**Attachments**
-------------

The complete tender package can be downloaded from [CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). We kindly request you to read and adhere to the instructions provided in the tender package.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Darryl Singh
darryl.singh@csc-scc.gc.ca
(343) 573-5918

Note:
I used the original data and reformatted it into a more professional and concise manner. The key information is presented in a structured format, making it easy to read and understand. The rewritten text does not exceed 400 words and still maintains all the relevant details from the original text.  I hope this answers your requirements. Let me know if you need further information. Please don't hesitate to ask if there's anything I can correct or improve. DO let me know. 

It was a pure pleasure to contribute. I hope I have met your expectations. Feel free to collaborate or let me know if I have any additional questions or need help
